meanings.definition: At or to a great distance.
meanings.sent1: She ran far away from the scary dog.
meanings.sent2: He could see the mountains far in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped far up the tree to escape the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried far across the empty field.
meanings.sent5: The ball rolled far down the hill, out of reach.

meanings.definition: To a considerable extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to far exceed his previous score in the game.
meanings.sent2: They have worked far too hard on this project.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to far season the soup with extra spices.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness far outweighs any mistakes she may have made.
meanings.sent5: The team will far surpass their fundraising goal with this event.

meanings.sent1: The far future holds many possibilities.
meanings.sent2: The old house was located in a far corner of the village.
meanings.sent3: The far memories of childhood bring a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His dreams seemed as far as the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The far lands beyond the sea beckoned to the adventurous explorer.
